## Sqlite

Since sqlite is a file-based very lightweight database, GUI tools also include it.
Also every major programming language has necessary bindings.
If you only use it from programming language or GUI tool, you may not have to download it.

[sqlite downloads](https://www.sqlite.org/download.html)

### Demo

1. Download sqlite
2. open command line
3. download [chinook db](https://github.com/ati-ozgur/course-database/raw/refs/heads/main/databases/Chinook-auto-increment.db).
4. show contents in the command line.
